ValidationRule.description: When Outage is selected at assess stage, Outage Type cannot be empty or "None"
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(($Setup.CH_CaseStatus_Validation_Bypass__c.CH_Disable_Validation_Rules__c = false), AND(ISBLANK(TEXT( CH_OutageType__c )), ISPICKVAL(CH_Outage__c, 'Yes'), CH_RecordTypeDevName__c <> 'CH_Problem', OR(ISPICKVAL(CH_Stage__c, 'Investigate & Restore'), ISPICKVAL(CH_Stage__c, 'Diagnosis & Technical Analysis'), ISPICKVAL(CH_Stage__c, 'Resolve'), ISPICKVAL(CH_Stage__c, 'Detect'), ISPICKVAL(CH_Stage__c, 'Neutralize'), ISPICKVAL(CH_Stage__c, 'Correct'), ISPICKVAL(CH_Stage__c, 'Prevent'), ISPICKVAL(CH_Stage__c, 'Report'), ISPICKVAL(CH_Stage__c, 'Review'), ISPICKVAL(CH_Stage__c, 'Remedy'), ISPICKVAL(CH_Stage__c, 'Close'))))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Outage Type cannot be empty, if Case is an Outage
